reviews.review: ZBS GAMZA

This game is awesome. Combat mechanics are really smooth, really doesn't get boring shooting zombies in the face. The game has alot of depth for an arcade-y zombie game, the modding community is pretty decent, and the harder modes of the game are very challenging. The amount of DLC is a little off-putting, but you don't NEED any of the packs to enjoy the game to it's full potential.

When you hear the term KIlling Floor you don't expect to get much, maybe a 3-bit game made in the 90's, but dear baby sweet Jesus this game is kickass. The begining of the game catches your eye right away, great graphics, great overall gameplay, the game seems to carry a great deal of challenges, and a booty load of infected to kill. the game runs well on lower end computers  pretty well I had a laptop with a 1.3 GHz CPU and I was able to play and log over 80 hours on this game( thanks to my some what retarded badass friend Scotticus, just kidding love you buddy :) ) and even more so now that I have upgraded, but great game and I would recommend this! :)

P.S. If you would like to play a game on killing floor, message me :)

Great game, has themed events for holidays

I find this game very entertainng. People may bash it for the simplicity, and lack of single player. But the ammount of support for mods make for a fresh experience. The gunplay is pretty satisfying, with very nice limb dismemberment and headshots. Theres an active effect called "ZED TIME" when the game thinks you did something cool, for example, a single bullet penetrating threw 3 or 4 heads. When "ZED TIME" kicks in, everything gets slow-motion, and you have extream accurecy with very little threat, (Your aimer moves quickly but the zombies do not.) Its got a very tacticle feel to it, Where you get money for each wave of zombies you survive. Then the traded opens for a few moments, you can restock on armor,  gernades, ammo and of corse, firearms. There is also a perk system, where doing certian tasks level your selected perk. They provide some decent class bonuses, most consisting of discounts to your specific wepond class when you buy from the trader. There is a great varity of weponds as well. Ranging from the Katana to rocket launchers and everything in-between. HOWEVER, A HUGE NEGETIVE FOR ME IS TRIPWIRE WANTS YOU TO SHELL OUT REAL CASH TO BUY WEPOND PACKS. They are nothing amazing, but if they arent anything great, why make us pay? Bad tripwire. But like i said before, the mods keep me into it, and also keep everything fresh. I personaly love the "Gun Game" mod, pretty much modled after Call Of Duty's game type. Theres also DM, TDM, and DM Extreame, which is a deathmatch with random zombies in the mix. Theres also some other modes, but another thing that keeps this game fresh is events. Holiday or whatever, but they add new things, new unlockable characters, and reskins to all the zombies. But all in all, this game is a deffinte hit for me, and at its price point, its worth a shot to anyone intrested for sure.

Killing Floor was a little bit awkward when I first picked it up. Without the ability to run, and a brutally long perk system, the game is rather hard to get into day 1. But if you grab some of your friends and throw them in with you, this game becomes a blast. Lots of weapons for each class, combined with all of the different types of enemies and skins they get for the holidays, Killing Floor is a must have for any shooter fan.

Мультиплеер...лишь он здесь есть (и должен быть), в одиночку игра мертва, ибо сразу становится пусто и грустно (да-да и некому руку подать). Кстати к моему величайшему удивлению сеттинг игры находится в соединенном королевстве, которое вы собственно очищаете от орд разнообразных (каждый найдет свой любимый типаж) зомбей в команде со своими напарниками. В отличии от лефт фо дэд (которая,кстати. мне больше по душе) сам принцип геймплея иной, т.е. мы конечно же всех вокруг убиваем, но при этом наше пространство ограниченно, у нас нет цели дойти куда-то, укрепиться и выжить лишь. Как бы это ни было странно (даже для видеоигры) после каждой волны открывается магазин, где мы можем прикупить то или иное вооружение. Забыл упомянуть - тут есть рпг-элементы в виде классов доступных персонажей для игры (правда полезность этого сомнительна). Как бы там ни было для разнообразия вместо l4d можно играть и в это.
